title: Unboxing a freaking laser - Glowforge Pro
description: Alex has been asking us for months for a new laser for engraving and cutting... he finally got his wish, but he has to unbox it first.   Check out the Glowforge 3D Laser printer through our affiliate link and get up to $500 off their model lineup at   Buy Laser Engraving Material On Amazon (Paid Link):   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  GET MERCH:   Twitter:  Instagram:  Facebook:
